summary: HeaderTopBar was updated to point to a new emblem filename and keeps advisor text and call CTA unchanged, but the emblem is still referenced from /assets/generated/ and there is no evidence a new optimized static asset was added under frontend/public/assets/ as required.

The diff does not show the uploaded/optimized asset being added or referenced from the correct location.
